```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

## Read in the data
```{r}
seasons_all <- read_tsv("master_season1-35.tsv")
```

## Create new dataframe with all seasons
```{r}
seasons_all_cat <- seasons_all %>%
  group_by(category) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```
